geekshop.model

Class PasswordRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • geekshop.model.PasswordRules

  • @Entity
public class PasswordRules
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the rules with which User's Passwords are validated.
    Author:
    Sebastian DÃ¶ring

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private final java.lang.String id
        Because there ought to exist only one instance of this class, the ID is always initialized with "passwordRules".

        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • PasswordRules

        public PasswordRules()
        Creates new PasswordRules. All options (special characters, upper and lower case, digits) are necessary. Minimal length is set to 8.

      • PasswordRules

        public PasswordRules(boolean upperAndLowerNecessary,
                     boolean digitsNecessary,
                     boolean specialCharactersNecessary,
                     int minLength)
        Creates new PasswordRules with the given flags and minimal length.
        Parameters:
        minLength - must be at least 4.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if minLength is less than 4.

    • Method Detail

      • generateRandomPassword

        public java.lang.String generateRandomPassword()
        Generates a valid random password based on the rules set. Its length is equal to the minimal length set.

      • isValidPassword

        public boolean isValidPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Validates the given password according to the rules.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the set conditions are fulfilled, the password is long enough, does not contain any white space characters and contains at least one alphanumeric character.

      • isValidPassword

        public boolean isValidPassword(PasswordAttributes passwordAttributes)
        Validates the given password in the form of PasswordAttributes according to the rules.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the set conditions are fulfilled, the password is long enough, does not contain any white space characters and contains at least one alphanumeric character.

      • containsUpperAndLower

        public static boolean containsUpperAndLower(java.lang.String password)
        Checks whether at least one upper- and one lower-case character are contained in the given password.

      • containsDigits

        public static boolean containsDigits(java.lang.String password)
        Checks whether at least one digit is contained in the given password.

      • containsSpecialCharacters

        public static boolean containsSpecialCharacters(java.lang.String password)
        Checks whether at least one special character, i. e. no Latin letter, digit or white space character, is contained in the given password.

      • isLongEnough

        private boolean isLongEnough(java.lang.String password)
        Checks whether the given password's length is equal or more than the set minimal length.

      • isLongEnough

        private boolean isLongEnough(int passwordLength)
        Checks whether the given password length is equal or more than the set minimal length.
